ygData.subject: Re: News about PoF
ygData.msgSnippet: Wah, no way to get my Paladin Armor liao. Sob sob. well at least I can trry to get full rubicate (except for the stupid looking plate helm) ... -- Gary Qui
ygData.messageBody:
Wah, no way to get my Paladin Armor liao. Sob sob. well at least I can
trry to get full rubicate (except for the stupid looking plate helm)
